mapper.select: SELECT reservation.reservationCount, customer.customerID, roomtype.roomType, room.roomNumber, reservation.reservationStartDate, reservation.reservationFinishDate, reservationedit.editState FROM reservation, room, roomType, customer, reservationEdit WHERE reservation.RoomCount = room.roomCount AND room.roomTypeCount = roomType.roomTypeCount AND customer.customerCount = reservation.customerCount AND reservation.editCode = reservationedit.editCode

select roomtype.roomType, room.roomNumber, reservationedit.editState FROM reservation, room, roomType, reservationEdit WHERE reservation.RoomCount = room.roomCount AND room.roomTypeCount = roomType.roomTypeCount AND reservation.editCode = reservationedit.editCode
select distinct roomType.roomType roomType, room.roomprice roomPrice from room, roomType where room.roomTypeCount = roomType.roomTypeCount
mapper.update: update room set roomPrice = #{roomPrice} where roomTypeCount = ( select roomTypeCount from roomType where roomType = #{roomTypeTable.roomType} )
